articles.author: Suvashree Ghosh, Sidhartha Shukla
articles.title: Bitcoin Rises as US-China Trade Talks Spark Bullish Crypto Bets - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Bitcoin rose alongside Asian stocks and a strengthening dollar after news that the US and China plan to hold trade talks.
articles.content:
Bitcoin rose alongside Asian stocks and a strengthening dollar after news that the US and China plan to hold trade talks. 
The largest digital asset rose about 3.2% to top $97,500 on Wednesday morni… [+86 chars]
